name: .ACTM File Extension
summary: Learn about .ACTM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Macro file created by AutoCAD, a 2D and 3D design and engineering application; contains a sequence of actions recorded using AutoCAD's Action Recorder; may store recorded command line entries as well as selections from toolbars and menus.

content: ACTM files enable users to automate repetitive tasks. They can be shared with other AutoCAD users.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
